001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.ProjectGradesImporter.ProjectScore;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Assignment;
005import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.GradeBook;
006import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Student;
007import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
008import org.mockito.ArgumentCaptor;
009import org.slf4j.Logger;
010import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
011
012import java.io.Reader;
013import java.io.StringReader;
014import java.util.regex.Matcher;
015
016import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
017import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.containsString;
018import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.equalTo;
019import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertThrows;
020import static org.mockito.Mockito.*;
021
022public class ProjectGradesImporterTest {
023
024  private Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(this.getClass().getPackage().getName());
025
026  @Test
027  public void gradedProjectWithNoGradeThrowsScoreNotFoundException() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
028    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
029    project.addLine("asdfhjkl");
030    project.addLine("iadguow");
031
032    assertThrows(ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException.class, () ->
033      ProjectGradesImporter.getScoreFrom(project.getReader())
034    );
035  }
036
037  @Test
038  public void scoreRegularExpressionWorkWithSimpleCase() {
039    Matcher matcher = ProjectGradesImporter.scorePattern.matcher("3.0 out of 4.5");
040    assertThat(matcher.find(), equalTo(true));
041    assertThat(matcher.groupCount(), equalTo(2));
042    assertThat(matcher.group(1), equalTo("3.0"));
043    assertThat(matcher.group(2), equalTo("4.5"));
044  }
045
046  @Test
047  public void gradedProjectWithOutOfHasValidScore() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
048    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
049    project.addLine("3.4 out of 3.5");
050    project.addLine("iadguow");
051
052    ProjectScore score = ProjectGradesImporter.getScoreFrom(project.getReader());
053    assertThat(score.getScore(), equalTo(3.4));
054    assertThat(score.getTotalPoints(), equalTo(3.5));
055  }
056
057  @Test
058  public void scoreMatchesRegardlessOfCase() {
059    Matcher matcher = ProjectGradesImporter.scorePattern.matcher("4.0 OUT OF 5.0");
060    assertThat(matcher.find(), equalTo(true));
061    assertThat(matcher.groupCount(), equalTo(2));
062    assertThat(matcher.group(1), equalTo("4.0"));
063    assertThat(matcher.group(2), equalTo("5.0"));
064  }
065
066  @Test
067  public void scoreMatchesIntegerPoints() {
068    Matcher matcher = ProjectGradesImporter.scorePattern.matcher("4 out of 5");
069    assertThat(matcher.find(), equalTo(true));
070    assertThat(matcher.groupCount(), equalTo(2));
071    assertThat(matcher.group(1), equalTo("4"));
072    assertThat(matcher.group(2), equalTo("5"));
073  }
074
075  @Test
076  public void scoreMatchesInTheMiddleOfOtherText() {
077    Matcher matcher = ProjectGradesImporter.scorePattern.matcher("You got 4 out of 5 points");
078    assertThat(matcher.find(), equalTo(true));
079    assertThat(matcher.groupCount(), equalTo(2));
080    assertThat(matcher.group(1), equalTo("4"));
081    assertThat(matcher.group(2), equalTo("5"));
082  }
083
084  @Test
085  public void gradedProjectWithIntegerPoints() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
086    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
087    project.addLine("3 out of 5");
088    project.addLine("iadguow");
089
090    ProjectScore score = ProjectGradesImporter.getScoreFrom(project.getReader());
091    assertThat(score.getScore(), equalTo(3.0));
092    assertThat(score.getTotalPoints(), equalTo(5.0));
093  }
094
095  private class GradedProject {
096    private StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
097
098    public void addLine(String line) {
099      sb.append(line);
100      sb.append("\n");
101    }
102
103    public Reader getReader() {
104      return new StringReader(sb.toString());
105    }
106  }
107
108  @Test
109  public void onlyFirstScoreIsReturned() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
110    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
111    project.addLine("3.4 out of 3.5");
112    project.addLine("iadguow");
113    project.addLine("3.3 out of 3.4");
114
115    ProjectScore score = ProjectGradesImporter.getScoreFrom(project.getReader());
116    assertThat(score.getScore(), equalTo(3.4));
117    assertThat(score.getTotalPoints(), equalTo(3.5));
118  }
119
120  @Test
121  public void scoreIsRecordedInGradeBook() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
122    String studentId = "student";
123    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("project", 6.0);
124
125    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
126    gradeBook.addStudent(new Student(studentId));
127    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
128
129    String score = "5.8";
130    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
131    project.addLine(score + " out of 6.0");
132    project.addLine("");
133    project.addLine("asdfasd");
134
135    Logger logger = mock(Logger.class);
136    ProjectGradesImporter importer = new ProjectGradesImporter(gradeBook, assignment, logger);
137    importer.recordScoreFromProjectReport(studentId, project.getReader());
138
139    assertThat(gradeBook.getStudent(studentId).get().getGrade(assignment.getName()).getScore(), equalTo(5.8));
140    assertThat(gradeBook.isDirty(), equalTo(true));
141
142    ArgumentCaptor<String> message = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(String.class);
143    verify(logger).info(message.capture());
144    assertThat(message.getValue(), containsString("Recorded grade of " + score + " for " + studentId));
145  }
146
147  @Test
148  public void throwIllegalStateExceptionWhenTotalPointsInReportDoesNotMatchGradeBook() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
149    String studentId = "student";
150    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("project", 8.0);
151
152    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
153    gradeBook.addStudent(new Student(studentId));
154    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
155
156    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
157    project.addLine("5.8 out of 6.0");
158    project.addLine("");
159    project.addLine("asdfasd");
160
161    ProjectGradesImporter importer = new ProjectGradesImporter(gradeBook, assignment, logger);
162    assertThrows(IllegalStateException.class, () ->
163      importer.recordScoreFromProjectReport(studentId, project.getReader())
164    );
165  }
166
167  @Test
168  public void logWarningWhenStudentDoesNotExistInGradeBook() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
169    String studentId = "student";
170    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("project", 6.0);
171
172    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
173    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
174
175    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
176    project.addLine("5.8 out of 6.0");
177    project.addLine("");
178    project.addLine("asdfasd");
179
180    Logger logger = mock(Logger.class);
181    ProjectGradesImporter importer = new ProjectGradesImporter(gradeBook, assignment, logger);
182
183    importer.recordScoreFromProjectReport(studentId, project.getReader());
184
185    assertThat(gradeBook.containsStudent(studentId), equalTo(false));
186
187    ArgumentCaptor<String> message = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(String.class);
188    verify(logger, times(1)).warn(message.capture());
189    assertThat(message.getValue(), containsString("Student \"" + studentId + "\" not found in gradebook"));
190  }
191
192}
